imports:
import CallOutBanner from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/CallOutBanner";
import Illustration from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Illustration";

info.title: Actionable callout banner
info.description: To make the entire callout banner actionable and automatically add the appropriate elevation, use the onClick prop. This will also make the callout banner focusable by adding a tab index.
